member_organisations:

- BUNGE 
- IMCOPA 
- LECICO

eu_initiatives: Food and Feed Policy, namely re-evalution of food additives (E322 Lecithins) - Regulation (EC) 1333/2008 and authorisation of lecithins as a feed additive -  Regulation (EC) No 1831/2003.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ELMA is a member of EU Specialty Food Ingredients (Federation of European Specialty Food Ingredients Industries, formerly ELC). (EU Specialty Food Ingredients' identification number in the Register is 6160532422-38).
goals__remit:
- To represent and defend the interest of Lecithin industry 
 
- To monitor issues on scientific, technological, and regulatory matters
